name: Hunters of the Kalfus Crows
description: Hailing from the high reaches of Mt. Kalfus, the Hunters of the Kalfus Crows are known as handlers, friends of candescent crows, and have since developed a sixth sense to detect nearby magic use. Now a member of a group researching the intersection of Groodu and Rootmason magics, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
